description:
Summary:

Update library dependencies and build tools versions to correct and latest ones.
Irradicate sync and build errors + warnings.
Issues with build variant.

Steps to reproduce:

Clone the project and build it.

Expected behaviour:

The build should be successful without any dependency warnings or errors.

Observed behaviour:

Dependency warnings, build tools outdated, build variant issues.
name: Mifos Mobile: Update library dependencies and build tools, configure build variant
